SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT7037ShoKofuKaishu" WHERE rgdb."DbT7037ShoKofuKaishu"."isDeleted" = FALSE

mapper.update: UPDATE rgdb."DbT7037ShoKofuKaishu" SET "kofuYMD"=#{kofuYMD}, "yukoKigenYMD"=#{yukoKigenYMD}, "kofuJiyu"=#{kofuJiyu}, "kofuRiyu"=#{kofuRiyu}, "kaishuYMD"=#{kaishuYMD}, "kaishuJiyu"=#{kaishuJiyu}, "kaishuRiyu"=#{kaishuRiyu}, "hakkoShoriTimestamp"=#{hakkoShoriTimestamp} WHERE "hihokenshaNo"=#{hihokenshaNo} AND "kofuShoShurui"=#{kofuShoShurui} AND "logicalDeletedFlag"= false
